course_description: Prerequisite: HPM 500 or HPM 501 or permission of instructor. Explores and analyzes the current reform process in European and North American health systems. Emphasizes normative policy as well as financial objectives, and the conflicting interests of key actors. Concludes with a consideration of implications for health system reform in the United States.
sections: Class Nbr: 4532, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: F 10:15a-12:05p, Instructor: Saltman/Liu, Status: Open
